mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( (SELECT COUNT(1) storeNum FROM CP_OUT_SITE_STORE coss WHERE coss.OUT_ID = 1) AS storeNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) couponNum FROM CP_OUT_SITE_COUPON cosc WHERE cosc.OUT_SITE_ID = 1) AS couponNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) validCouponNum FROM CP_OUT_SITE_COUPON cosc LEFT JOIN CP_COUPON cp ON cosc.COUPON_ID = cp.ID WHERE cosc.OUT_SITE_ID = 1 AND cp.EXPIRE_AT > NOW()) AS validCouponNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) codeCouponNum FROM CP_OUT_SITE_COUPON cosc LEFT JOIN CP_COUPON cp ON cosc.COUPON_ID = cp.ID WHERE cosc.OUT_SITE_ID = 1 AND cp.COUPON_TYPE ='CODE') AS codeCouponNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) dealCouponNum FROM CP_OUT_SITE_COUPON cosc LEFT JOIN CP_COUPON cp ON cosc.COUPON_ID = cp.ID WHERE cosc.OUT_SITE_ID = 1 AND cp.COUPON_TYPE ='DEAL') AS dealCouponNum )
